Nathan Batalion,ND World-Renowned Philosopher


Nathan Batalion,ND international lecturer, co-founder Raw-Wisdom Community, featured Tuesday December 1, Optimum Health Solution~Raw New England Dinner Speaker Series on:

REVERSING GRAVE HARMS OF POLLUTION AND GENETICALLY MODIFIED FOODS


Nowadays we're inundated by chemical and genetic pollution. Imagine not just greed is at fault and to reverse things, we shift to a life-centered vision of nature .

Nathan Batalion has a BA in religion and philosophy, an MA in Asian Studies; an MBA in Accounting and is a PhD candidate in environmental philosophy at Binghamton University. He also studied towards an Oriental MD degree at The Pacific Institute and is a licensed Naturopath as well as health and life coach. Nathan is the popular author of 50 Harmful Effects of Genetically Modified Foods, plus a co-founder of both the Raw-Wisdom Community (a branch of Dr. Gabriel Cousins' Tree of Life) and the Gerson Wellness Center at Sedona. Nathan yet further studied raw and vegan diets at Hippocrates in Puerto Rico and with the late Dr. Bernard Jenson. Lastly, as a youth he was a math prodigy who won math competitions until one day his left-brain functions shut down after a high fever. Nathan then got a glimpse into a unique way of understanding our grand universe, one that differs from contemporary physics, chemistry, and most ancient traditions. From this glimpse he developed a profoundly life-centered view of nature. He's here to share this extraordinary experience plus offer a hopeful, positive message on how we can turnaround or heal our culture's growing eco-health crises.
